attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition our legally elected PM to reduce the already heavy burden on the common man by reducing taxes on all areas related to the use of cars and other motorised vehicles. We also insist that as part of the update of the Trident nuclear defence system a huge statue of Neptune is built under The Irish Sea which breaks the surface upon activation and hurls 3 ICBMs from his Trident. That would be cool.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
